name: Yolp - Flee Lava
description:
Have you ever imagined Getting Over It as a first person 3D platformer ? No ? Well , it exists now ! But just jumping and getting to the finish line isn't challenging enough so why not add lava in the mix ? Yeah, Lava. And it chases you. Get ready to run and get a better time each time (better with friends to challenge yourself even more).

Mix all that and you got Yolp, my first game made on Unreal for the Weekly Game Jam on week 225 with the Heat Wave theme.

Enjoy !
